main.name: Jay Chi
main.description: Whether it's poking around on the back end with Node, styling with Bootstrap, or even pushing models through Tensorflow. I can help. If you want to learn more about working with me, give me a call or email me
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: 17 week, full-time in-person software engineering program focused on full-stack JavaScript,Python,data structures and algorithms. Developed 30+ projects with React,Node.js, Express and Flask.

work.title: Intern
work.description: Developed a mobile app utilizing Node/Express wrapped around the main Rails server, caching requests using Redis (allowing for fast load times on the mobile app).  App was built utilizing React Native.

work.title: Lead Accountant
work.description: Worked with engineers for backend data queries as well as frontend journal entry input. Additionally, helped the engineers spec out a new financial database for internal accounting needs.  It was during this time that I wanted to go deeper into software development.
